title: The Pleasure Is Ours: "Don't Bite Off More Than You Can Chew"
itunes:title: The Pleasure Is Ours: "Don't Bite Off More Than You Can Chew"
description:
It's Ep. 5 of The Pleasure Is Ours—the This Is Important-hosted BONUS podcast all about blowing up stupid pieces of advice!


IN THIS EPISODE: While some might ponder the versatility of the phrase, "don't bite off more than you can chew," the guys on this podcast get literal...quick. So in this week's food-themed-episode of The Pleasure Is Ours, Kyle ponders whether caramel might be the stickiest thing a person could put in one's mouth while Blake reminisces a childhood affinity for shoving mozzarella sticks down his throat. And although Adam insists he's been able to "chew everything he's bitten," the fellas remind him of the time in his life when hosting the MTV movie awards and filming Game Over, Man turned a private jet afterparty into Snoozeville '98.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
